name: Lone Sentry
description:
You are a lone sentry. Fight oncoming waves of  undead enemies by upgrading your  sentry and stats.  Try your skill against 4 different difficulty levels.

. . .

Made in under 4 days for the Major Jam. The theme was: Isolation ~ there are no living things Thanks to metricfern and spazzedQ for playtesting and ideas. Art and music assets credited to: kicked-in-teeth, kyrise, pipoya, yd.

. . .

Please download the game for the best experience! Note: the MacOS and Linux builds of the game have not been tested.

. . .

~ Enjoy :3
